Member's Area
Welcome to the Gazetteer Community Member's Area!
Our Member's Area allows you to gain benefits from being part of our
community.  Membership, which is entirely free, gives you three main
be able to leave your comments and impressions about individual entries,
send e-postcards and get access to a fantastic range of mapping
which let you produce your own customised maps.  Our new 'family maps',
which let you <b>easily display all the places in Scotland associated with
your family, are easy-to-use and have been highly praised.
Remember that all of the content, including the maps, in the Member's Area
is dynamic, so what you see today may be different next week or next month.
Therefore it is worth checking back regularly.
You don't have to be a member to give us general
Click here to find out why you should join.
